name: sentinel-ai
description: AI-powered code review and analysis tool

scripts.build:clean: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm -r run build
scripts.check: pnpm lint && pnpm type-check && pnpm test -- --run
scripts.ci: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm check
scripts.sentinel:context: pnpm -r build && pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js build-context
scripts.sentinel:review:debug: SENTINEL_DEBUG_PROVIDER=1 pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:openai:debug: SENTINEL_DEBUG_PROVIDER=1 SENTINEL_PROVIDER=openai SENTINEL_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:nofail:dev: pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review: pnpm -r build && pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff
scripts.sentinel:review:fx:all: for f in 01-todo-and-hardcode 02-secrets-openai 03-perf-and-a11y 04-arch-boundaries 05-dangerous-inner-html; do SENTINEL_PROVIDER=openai pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff fixtures/$f.diff --fail-on none; done
scripts.sentinel:review:openai:dev: SENTINEL_PROVIDER=openai SENTINEL_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff fixtures/changes.diff --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:openai: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROVIDER=openai SENTINEL_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:render-md:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts render-md
scripts.sentinel:render-md: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-md
scripts.sentinel:render-html:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts render-html
scripts.sentinel:render-html: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-html
scripts.smoke:mock: pnpm sentinel:diff && SENTINEL_PROVIDER=mock SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff --fail-on none && pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-md && pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-html
scripts.smoke:openai: pnpm sentinel:diff && SENTINEL_PROVIDER=openai SENTINEL_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --diff .sentinel/reviews/changes.diff --fail-on none && pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-md && pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-html
